### Installation

You can install the released version of SRxgboost from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

```{r setup, eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
devtools::install_github("samuelreuther/SRxgboost")

install.packages("/home/sandbox/sandbox/Libraries/SRxgboost_0.7.1.tar.gz",
                 repos = NULL, type = "source", dependencies = TRUE)

library(SRxgboost)
```
